Description: Sherd preserving full profile of East Greek (North Ionian) Late Wild Goat pottery plate; exterior probably reserved save for glaze blot; interior: cream slip; maeander band on rim; on floor, between bands with added red lines, frieze of alternating lozenges and sets of tongues, all with added red; in tondo, buds; two suspension holes at top of wall.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.763)
